name: Space Break (itch)
description:
In the year 2084

An Space Pilot named Mark is exploring the great, suddenly he stumbles upon a space colony called the Soen , and they wanted earth! so it's up to to you in the true blue , a spacecraft load with an energy ball, to destroy the Soen.

LeftRightLaunch BallADSpace

Comment your high score, and see who's the best space pilot
